verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֞ר <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> came עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> that came to Jeremiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> concerning all the people יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year הָֽרְבִעִ֔ית <S%H7243><s%> in the fourth לִיהוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3079><s%> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֖הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he הַשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year הָרִ֣אשֹׁנִ֔ית <S%H7224><s%> that [was] the first לִנְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֖ר <S%H5019><s%> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֜ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <S%H3414><s%> The which Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> the prophet עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֶ֛ל <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> and to all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> that [is] the three עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֡ה <S%H8141><s%> year לְיֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמוֹן֩ <S%H526><s%> of Amon מֶ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְעַ֣ד ׀ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even unto this day הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> to this זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> these שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has come דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> to me וָאֲדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> hath come unto me and I have spoken אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H413><s%> to you אַשְׁכֵּ֥ים <S%H7925><s%> unto you rising early וְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> and speaking וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H8085><s%> but ye have not hearkened

וְשָׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> hath sent יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> about אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדָ֧יו <S%H5650><s%> unto you all his servants הַנְּבִאִ֛ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֥ם <S%H7925><s%> rising early וְשָׁלֹ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> and sending וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <S%H8085><s%> [them] but ye have not hearkened וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor הִטִּיתֶ֥ם <S%H5186><s%> nor inclined אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנְכֶ֖ם <S%H241><s%> your ear לִשְׁמֹֽעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> to hear

לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> They said שֽׁוּבוּ־ <S%H7725><s%> Turn ye again נָ֞א <S%H4994><s%> now אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> now every one מִדַּרְכּ֤וֹ <S%H1870><s%> way הָֽרָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> from his evil וּמֵרֹ֣עַ <S%H7455><s%> and from the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H4611><s%> of your doings וּשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> and dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> hath given יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3069><s%> God לָכֶ֖ם וְלַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> unto you and to your fathers לְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> and ever

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּלְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> go אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> not after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other לְעָבְדָ֖ם <S%H5647><s%> to serve וּלְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <S%H7812><s%> them and to worship לָהֶ֑ם וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תַכְעִ֤יסוּ <S%H3707><s%> them and provoke me not to anger אוֹתִי֙ <S%H854><s%> with בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> with the works יְדֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> of your hands וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no אָרַ֖ע <S%H7489><s%> and I will do you no hurt לָכֶֽם׃

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֥ם <S%H8085><s%> Yet ye have not hearkened אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> unto me saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְמַ֧עַן <S%H4616><s%> order [הִכְעִסוּנִי כ] (הַכְעִיסֵ֛נִי <S%H3707><s%> be angry ק) בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> with the works יְדֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> of your hands לְרַ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> to your own hurt לָכֶֽם׃ ס

לָכֵ֕ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts יַ֕עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H8085><s%> Because ye have not heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָרָֽי׃ <S%H1697><s%> my words

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold שֹׁלֵ֡חַ <S%H7971><s%> Behold I will send וְלָקַחְתִּי֩ <S%H3947><s%> and take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁפְּח֨וֹת <S%H4940><s%> all the families צָפ֜וֹן <S%H6828><s%> of the north נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נְבֽוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <S%H5019><s%> and Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶל֮ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon עַבְדִּי֒ <S%H5650><s%> my servant וַהֲבִ֨אֹתִ֜ים <S%H935><s%> and will bring עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them against this land הַזֹּאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against יֹ֣שְׁבֶ֔יהָ <S%H3427><s%> and against the inhabitants וְעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> thereof and against all these nations הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְהַ֣חֲרַמְתִּ֔ים <S%H2763><s%> and will utterly destroy וְשַׂמְתִּים֙ <S%H7760><s%> them and make לְשַׁמָּ֣ה <S%H8047><s%> them an astonishment וְלִשְׁרֵקָ֔ה <S%H8322><s%> and an hissing וּלְחָרְב֖וֹת <S%H2723><s%> desolations עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> and perpetual

וְהַאֲבַדְתִּ֣י <S%H6><s%> Moreover I will take מֵהֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> them ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> from them the voice שָׂשׂוֹן֙ <S%H8342><s%> of mirth וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice שִׂמְחָ֔ה <S%H8057><s%> of gladness ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice חָתָ֖ן <S%H2860><s%> of the bridegroom וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice כַּלָּ֑ה <S%H3618><s%> of the bride ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the sound רֵחַ֖יִם <S%H7347><s%> of the millstones וְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> and the light נֵֽר׃ <S%H5216><s%> of the candle

וְהָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> whole הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And this whole land הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> will be a לְחָרְבָּ֖ה <S%H2723><s%> shall be a desolation לְשַׁמָּ֑ה <S%H8047><s%> [and] an astonishment וְעָ֨בְד֜וּ <S%H5647><s%> shall serve הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> and these nations הָאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become כִמְלֹ֣אות <S%H4390><s%> are accomplished שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> And it shall come to pass when seventy שָׁנָ֡ה <S%H8141><s%> years אֶפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> [that] I will punish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶל֩ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and that הַגּ֨וֹי <S%H1471><s%> and that nation הַה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹנָ֖ם <S%H5771><s%> for their iniquity וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <S%H7760><s%> and will make אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לְשִֽׁמְמ֥וֹת <S%H8077><s%> desolations עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> it perpetual

[וְהֵבֵאיתִי כ] (וְהֵֽבֵאתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> abide ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon that land הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּבָרַ֖י <S%H1697><s%> all my words אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֣רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> which I have pronounced עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַכָּתוּב֙ <S%H3789><s%> against it [even] all that is written בַּסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in this book הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִבָּ֥א <S%H5012><s%> hath prophesied יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> which Jeremiah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> against all the nations

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עָֽבְדוּ־ <S%H5647><s%> shall serve בָ֤ם גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> like גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> For many וּמְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> kings גְּדוֹלִ֑ים <S%H1419><s%> and great וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֥י <S%H7999><s%> themselves of them also and I will recompense לָהֶ֛ם כְּפָעֳלָ֖ם <S%H6467><s%> them according to their deeds וּכְמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> and according to the works יְדֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> of their own hands ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹה֩ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me קַ֠ח <S%H3947><s%> unto me Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כּ֨וֹס <S%H3563><s%> cup הַיַּ֧יִן <S%H3196><s%> the wine הַחֵמָ֛ה <S%H2534><s%> of this fury הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> from מִיָּדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> at my hand וְהִשְׁקִיתָ֤ה <S%H8248><s%> thee to drink אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> and cause all the nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> to whom אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁלֵ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> to whom I send אוֹתְךָ֖ <S%H853><s%> אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וְשָׁת֕וּ <S%H8354><s%> And they shall drink וְהִֽתְגֹּֽעֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H1607><s%> and be moved וְהִתְהֹלָ֑לוּ <S%H1984><s%> and be mad מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because הַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> that אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁלֵ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> that I will send בֵּינֹתָֽם׃ <S%H996><s%> among

וָאֶקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> Then took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכּ֖וֹס <S%H3563><s%> I the cup מִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> hand יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> at the LORD'S וָֽאַשְׁקֶה֙ <S%H8248><s%> to drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> and made all the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to whom שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <S%H7971><s%> had sent יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto whom the LORD אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about
